programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S24
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The Cube USA S1
programme.desc: Dwyane Wade introduces The Cube, 15 square feet of steel-edged plexiglass where simple tasks become challenges; teams have nine lives to win seven games to beat The Cube for a chance to walk away with $250,000.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S2
programme.desc: The toughest Bake Off of them all is back again. Twelve teams from across Britain compete to craft exquisite entremets, delicious desserts and spectacular showpieces. Who will impress world-renowned judges Benoit Blin and Cherish Finden, and be crowned the winner?

programme.title: Shark with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Features naturalist and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall, as he gets us closer to sharks, to encounter a diverse and incredible family of over 400 different types. This global journey will take us to the remotest parts of our planet, from the sun-drenched tropics to the mysterious depths of our oceans.

programme.title: Survivor 46
programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! & The Chipmunks S3
programme.desc: A single dad has his hands full raising six rambunctious chipmunks in this animated comedy!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! & The Chipmunks S3
programme.desc: A single dad has his hands full raising six rambunctious chipmunks in this animated comedy!

programme.title: Molang S5
programme.desc: A curious and dreamy rabbit called Molang and an inquisitive little chick called Piu Piu are inseparable best friends who always have a wonderful time going on adventures together.

programme.title: Super BOOMi S6
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Chinese) Super BOOMi follows an animated bear and his friends as they learn and play in a virtual reality game universe.

programme.desc: (Dual language English and Chinese) Super BOOMi follows an animated bear and his friends as they learn and play in a virtual reality game universe.

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: Blippi's enthusiastic and expressive character engages children on their level through relatable adventures while sharing their excitement in discovering the world around us. Blippi is so entertaining, engaging and fun, kids don't even realize they're learning!

programme.title: Ollie & Friends
programme.desc: Ollie & Friends.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Sesame Street S52
programme.desc: Elmo's newly-adopted puppy Tango joins the show in a new recurring animated segment, "Elmo & Tango's Mysterious Mysteries"!

programme.title: Andy' Safari Adventures
programme.desc: Popular children's presenter Andy Day takes viewers closer than ever before to the wildlife, large and small, that inhabits our planet. This fun-filled series combines Andy's jaw-dropping adventures across the globe with stunning footage from the Natural History Unit showing incredible creatures and their behaviours. When things don't go to plan in Safari World - the fantastic safari park where Andy works - the intrepid explorer races to the rescue.

programme.title: Andy' Safari Adventures

When things don't go to plan in Safari World - the fantastic safari park where Andy works - the intrepid explorer races to the rescue.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S3
programme.desc: Farmer Haywire preps for a sheep contest but can't pick his top ten. He asks the Number Squad to count and separate the woolliest sheep for the competition. Mr. Mengo prepares for the yearly summer snowman tradition, using magic to create snow and snowman. However, his magic has gone out of control and he's unable to magic up a proper snowman, the Number Squad rushes to his aid!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S10
programme.desc: Everyone is ready for the Monster Truck Championship! But when a pup named Boomer takes his motorized mischief to the streets of Adventure Bay, will the PAW Patrol be able to get the race back on track?

programme.desc: (Dual language English and Chinese) Super BOOMi follows an animated bear and his friends as they learn and play in a virtual reality game universe.

programme.title: Go Go Dino S7-S9
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) Rex, Tomo, Viki, Ping, and Rocky, a group of dinosaurs, team up to explore and find new friends on planet M25.

programme.title: Go Go Dino S7-S9
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) Rex, Tomo, Viki, Ping, and Rocky, a group of dinosaurs, team up to explore and find new friends on planet M25.

programme.title: Molang S5
programme.desc: A curious and dreamy rabbit called Molang and an inquisitive little chick called Piu Piu are inseparable best friends who always have a wonderful time going on adventures together.

programme.title: Totally Spies S3
programme.desc: Three teenage girls from Beverly Hills attempt to balance their lives as high school (later university) students with their undercover work as super-spies, battling an array of bizarre criminals!

programme.title: Jonny Jetboy
programme.desc: Jonny Jones and his family are secretly superheroes known as The Jetfleet! Together they face off against their city's villains all the while learning what it is to be a true hero.

programme.title: Jonny Jetboy
programme.desc: Jonny Jones and his family are secretly superheroes known as The Jetfleet! Together they face off against their city's villains all the while learning what it is to be a true hero.

programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: When crises strike wild animals around the planet, a team of heroic seven-year-olds transform their high-tech backpacks into robotic pets and rush off on daring missions to rescue them. This team of heroic kids and their robotic pets stands on call, ready to leap into action when danger strikes animals around the world.

programme.title: Pokemon Horizons: The Series
programme.desc: The series stars two new protagonists, Liko and Roy, who team up with the Rising Volt Tacklers, a group of adventurers that explore the Pokmon world and visit various regions. As they do, they are pursued by the Explorers, a mysterious organization seeking Liko's pendant for unknown reasons.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: I Am a Hawker: Bib Gourmand Edition follows Singapore's most celebrated hawkers—those who've earned and fight to keep their Michelin Bib Gourmand. Each episode spotlights one hawker's journey through tradition, innovation, and the relentless pressure of holding that title, revealing the personal stakes, sacrifices, and resilience behind every award-winning dish.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: When Jessica can't get Ah Yoke to open up about Dr Shen, she hits upon an idea which she can force a reconciliation. After a meeting with Hassan, Zaryn realises that he is turning to be like his father. Razali pressures Zara to make a decision on their relationship.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off Series 11: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Each week, BAFTA-winning comedian Jo Brand shines a light on all the goings on from inside the tent. With the help of a celebrity panel, Jo serves up an extra helping of unseen moments, as well as devouring the tasty offerings brought in by the studio audience. Jo and her panel are also joined by the latest baker to leave to get all the gossip from their time on the show. And Tom Allen appears as a regular guest, reviewing audience members' bakes.

programme.title: Cooking Up A Fortune
programme.desc: Brand new series where the UK's most passionate cooks get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to launch their own food brand to the British public. Cooking Up a Fortune sees amateur foodies, who dream of escaping the rat race and cooking for a living, create and sell their dishes to hundreds of real diners in a purpose-built food arena. Each week the winning kitchen gets to launch their idea for a food business to paying customers in one of Europe's busiest food markets.

programme.title: Lingo UK S3
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Sitting on a Fortune S1
programme.desc: Players can win up-to 100,000 in prize money in this high-stakes, high-tension game show hosted by Gary Lineker. But with no lifelines or chances to walk away they will risk everything on getting the right answer.

programme.title: Provocative
programme.desc: Amira tries to convince Aida that moving away from Irfan's family is the best way forward. Caleb reels from the news of Tess going back to Pierce.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: John Torode's Asia
programme.desc: In this episode John Torode is in the tropical island paradise of Maldives in the Indian Ocean to explore its two sides: local life and the glossy 5-star resorts. John's first outing takes him to the local island of Huraa. Huraa is in Malé Atholhu, one of the country's 26 atolls. Here he meets Soba, who gives him an introduction to Maldivian cuisine by cooking a typical local dish for him using coconuts, chilies & tuna fish called Mas Fen Dhiya.

programme.title: Matlock S1
programme.desc: Madeline Matlock rejoins the work force at a prestigious law firm, where she uses her wily tactics to win cases and expose wrongdoing.

programme.title: So Help Me Todd S2
programme.desc: Lawrence enlists Todd's services to find out the sexual orientation of a judge; with her client's livelihood at stake, Margaret and Lyle search for a reluctant witness.

programme.desc: Special agents Maggie Bell and Zidan from the New York branch of the FBI work together to keep the city and country safe.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Everything you've ever wanted to know about Europe - from traditions and habits to culture shocks and record breakers.

Each week the winning kitchen gets to launch their idea for a food business to paying customers in one of Europe's busiest food markets.

programme.title: 最火搭档
programme.desc: 小曼调查小孩失踪案件，失踪孩子之后会身穿娃娃装地出现在闹市，而占卜师星晨竟能准确测出小孩出现的时间和地点，令人啧啧称奇。小曼根据星晨的预测在闹市埋伏，失踪小孩果然出现，而小曼也发现可疑小丑的踪迹，展开追捕….

programme.title: 最火搭档
programme.desc: 小曼和正仪到曹博失踪的地点调查，发现美月所说的曹博的失踪时间似乎与正确的失踪时间有所不同，当天美月虽然在现场找小孩，但现场的所有目击者都无法证明曹博在失踪之前曾经出现过，小曼和正仪怀疑美月有所隐瞒。.

programme.desc: 十三鞭.

programme.desc: 十三鞭.

programme.title: 五福到
programme.desc: 五福到.

programme.title: 五福到
programme.desc: 五福到.

programme.title: 百味人生
programme.desc: 成年礼是年轻人满一定的年龄时，告别稚嫩，迈向成人阶段的仪式。成年礼仪式结束后的聚餐活动，因地而异，因人而异，通过分享美食把人与人之间的感情紧密相连，以百味美食庆贺新成人接受生命的转变，步入人生新阶段。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 前线追踪
programme.desc: 民情、民生、民意！【前线追踪】紧跟社会民生步伐，追踪调查时事动态，探讨新加坡人关心的课题，针对问题的核心追根究底。.

programme.title: 活出好命来
programme.desc: 晓雯逃避浩良，躲去阳间。她看到光汉夫妻细心照顾自己父母，决定报恩。晓雯要求投胎，去做光汉女儿。浩良心灰意冷时，看到晓雯留下的信，恍然她此举用心良苦。因为晓雯只要转世，就不再是浩良老师。两人定下 30 年之约，相拥吻别。浩良亲手为晓雯编织最幸福的命带，没料到花娘娘从中作梗，换了一条最差的命带给了晓雯。.

programme.title: 狮城热话
programme.desc: 周一至周五晚上7点，《狮城有约》谈话性栏目《狮城热话》以汇集多元声音及专家看法为目标，通过网络投票和引导观点碰撞，打造能让观众参与的时事舆论场。.

programme.title: 但愿人长久
programme.desc: 1953年那个初冬的早晨，台湾眷村里，邓家第四个孩子，“丫头”邓丽君（陈妍希饰）诞生。丫头在歌唱方面的才华幼时便已显现，无奈父亲邓枢（侯勇饰）坚决反对。邓枢退伍，开始了市场摆摊生涯。丫头不解父亲心中的抑郁和乡愁，但她成了父亲卖包子馒头的小帮手。小学毕业后，丫头未能考上初中。但已透过电台歌唱比赛获胜成为歌唱节目的固定班底。邓枢在市场摆摊与流氓发生冲突，被殴打成伤，还闹上了官司。深夜里，夫妇俩感慨这一切只因没有固定店面所致。丫头听在耳里，心疼父母，成为签约歌手并预支薪水，用这笔钱替父亲顶下了店面，邓枢知道后感动不已。丫头终于顺利登台，获得许多好评。.

programme.title: 焦点
programme.desc: 《焦点》追踪国际时事，实地报道区域课题，以新加坡的视角分析时局发展的前因后果和潜在影响。.

programme.title: 甘味人生
programme.desc: 甘味人生，是一出阐述「一家人世代传承家业」的励志写实戏剧。剧中赵家是制作传统手工酱油的一个大家庭，家庭的父母兄弟姊妹，共同为这个家努力打拼的历程为主轴，描写刻画每个人在打拼的过程当中，与纠结在矛盾的感情世界里，所经历的悲欢喜乐。.

programme.title: 甘味人生
programme.desc: 甘味人生，是一出阐述「一家人世代传承家业」的励志写实戏剧。剧中赵家是制作传统手工酱油的一个大家庭，家庭的父母兄弟姊妹，共同为这个家努力打拼的历程为主轴，描写刻画每个人在打拼的过程当中，与纠结在矛盾的感情世界里，所经历的悲欢喜乐。.

programme.title: 一点新闻
programme.desc: (现场直播) 《一点新闻》为您提供更新的本地与全球新闻头条。.

programme.title: 开心速递
programme.desc: 故事围绕着洪氏和龙氏家族、他们的工作生活和朋友展开，在之前的剧集中，龙景峰的幽灵与洪氏家族成员结下了深厚的友谊。.

programme.title: 开心速递
programme.desc: 故事围绕着洪氏和龙氏家族、他们的工作生活和朋友展开，在之前的剧集中，龙景峰的幽灵与洪氏家族成员结下了深厚的友谊。.

programme.title: 开心速递
programme.desc: 故事围绕着洪氏和龙氏家族、他们的工作生活和朋友展开，在之前的剧集中，龙景峰的幽灵与洪氏家族成员结下了深厚的友谊。.

programme.title: 法言人
programme.desc: 主要是讲述了律师楼的师爷是开拓业务的开拓人，他作为一个桥梁来沟通市民和大状之间的关系，进而引发了一系列的故事。.

programme.title: 法言人
programme.desc: 主要是讲述了律师楼的师爷是开拓业务的开拓人，他作为一个桥梁来沟通市民和大状之间的关系，进而引发了一系列的故事。.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 狮城有约
programme.desc: (现场直播) 总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 但愿人长久
programme.desc: 1953年那个初冬的早晨，台湾眷村里，邓家第四个孩子，“丫头”邓丽君（陈妍希饰）诞生。丫头在歌唱方面的才华幼时便已显现，无奈父亲邓枢（侯勇饰）坚决反对。邓枢退伍，开始了市场摆摊生涯。丫头不解父亲心中的抑郁和乡愁，但她成了父亲卖包子馒头的小帮手。小学毕业后，丫头未能考上初中。但已透过电台歌唱比赛获胜成为歌唱节目的固定班底。邓枢在市场摆摊与流氓发生冲突，被殴打成伤，还闹上了官司。深夜里，夫妇俩感慨这一切只因没有固定店面所致。丫头听在耳里，心疼父母，成为签约歌手并预支薪水，用这笔钱替父亲顶下了店面，邓枢知道后感动不已。丫头终于顺利登台，获得许多好评。.

programme.title: 带爸妈去旅行
programme.desc: 陪伴，是世上最奢侈的礼物。阿贤将联同江瀚和慧敏带着父母去旅行，帮他们完成旅行愿望清单，用父母的速度旅行，双手相握一起看世界，是再多钱也换不到的人生体验，一起踏上奇幻浪漫的旅途。.

programme.title: 活出好命来
programme.desc: 裴老要查阎王减少地府居民人口的动机，阎王漏夜开了很多龟苓膏店，假装“龟苓膏计划”只是敛财手段。裴老妒忌一鸣帮阎王赚大钱，视一鸣为眼中钉。裴老派狄聚德去杀他，静静舍命相救，两人真情流露，互许终生。裴绍乾灌一鸣喝下地府的酒，一鸣变傻了；静静不惜偷渡人间，在黄泉路上被恶鬼袭击。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: (现场直播) 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 港女野人奇遇记
programme.desc: Mt Ngauruhoe既是毛利人圣山，也是一部魔幻电影的取景地，今集港女野人誓要登上这座「末日火山」！旅程挑战全长约20公里、海拔高逾1800米的单日行山径，此行变数难以预计，四位主持严阵以待决向登山教练求救！由国家公园内的行山径起步，预计需步行十小时，出发前突击各人背包，各自带了什么装备？出发路段平坦易行，沿途可见麦芦卡树小花，四人终近距离看到「末日火山」！真正的考验「魔鬼阶梯」亦在眼前…….

programme.title: 金庸武侠世界之铁血丹心
programme.desc: "傻小子"郭靖背负着家恨国仇闯入江湖，一路奇情奇遇，在红颜知己黄蓉的帮助下，最终成长为"为国为民，侠之大者"的民族英雄。.

programme.title: 长风渡
programme.desc: 扬州布商之女柳玉茹自小遭遇生母病重、庶母不慈、父亲不重视的困境，她不得已谨小慎微，做了十五年模范闺秀。不料，对婚姻抱有憧憬的她却被被家里安排嫁给了名满扬州的纨绔顾九思。顾九思也误会柳玉茹是因为攀附权贵才嫁给他，对其嗤之以鼻。柳玉茹幡然醒悟，不能将命运系之婚姻，系之他人，决定跟随顾母学习经商之道，真实、独立、精彩地实现自我价值。经过刻苦努力，柳玉茹顺利通过了顾母的考验，生意上逐渐得心应手，更是在此过程中改变了对顾九思的看法，发现其至纯至善、炽热真诚的一面，两个人的心也越靠越近。然而此时，扬州节度使王善泉凶狠毒辣、倒行逆施，导致百姓流离失所，顾家不得已举家逃亡，原本奢靡无度的顾九思看着万千流民，一夜之间长大。为结束混乱局面，让百姓安居，顾九思从捕快做起，官至户部尚书，与志同道合者扫除积弊，轻税轻徭。柳玉茹则内修善堂、外建商交，使得物资繁盛、百姓安康，两人共同谱写了一段盛世佳话。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 V
programme.desc: 《詹姆士出走料理》以寻找詹姆士私厨菜单为节目主轴，为了寻找记忆中的美味料理，詹姆士将带领大家探索市场，品尝在地美味、寻访料理达人。并在节目中展现特殊食材的处理方式、尝试新的酱料或是新的料理作法，制作创意料理(料理教学)，最后在节目片尾时作出一道『詹姆士创意料理.

programme.title: 想握你的手
programme.desc: 以本地的社会时事为骨架，描述同一个邻里几个不同背景的家庭，如何由冷漠自我，到最终了解何谓"爱"。故事反映了血浓于水、守望相助、远亲不如近邻的可贵精神。新传媒艺人黄文永在此剧中饰演父亲，是一家咖啡店的老板，为人节俭，有三个女儿，分别由林湘萍、李心钰和蔡佩璇饰演，而陈丽萍则饰演文永的妻子。.

programme.title: 想握你的手
programme.desc: 以本地的社会时事为骨架，描述同一个邻里几个不同背景的家庭，如何由冷漠自我，到最终了解何谓"爱"。故事反映了血浓于水、守望相助、远亲不如近邻的可贵精神。新传媒艺人黄文永在此剧中饰演父亲，是一家咖啡店的老板，为人节俭，有三个女儿，分别由林湘萍、李心钰和蔡佩璇饰演，而陈丽萍则饰演文永的妻子。.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 天赐的声音 S5
programme.desc: 《天赐的声音第五季》以华语乐坛的"新老传承”"为主旨，乐坛元老级人物带领中生代和新生代音乐人合作演绎大众喜爱的时代金曲，力求推出更多"青出于蓝"的作品。延续上一季的"队长制”，两队音乐人在队内排兵布阵，互相助力，全力创造万众期待的"天赐爆款"。.

programme.title: 收场
programme.desc: 收场.

programme.title: 收场
programme.desc: 收场.

programme.title: 型男大主厨 S3
programme.desc: 《型男大主厨》由金钟主持人曾国城、卓文萱及专业主厨詹姆士、吴秉承等人所共同主持。 主要有「超省时宴客菜」「五星级料理秀」「型男同乐会」「新厨挑战赛」等主题，除了综艺节目笑料，更能获得实质料理知识。.

programme.title: 幸福乡味
programme.desc: 世界上什么菜最好吃？答案是家乡菜。异地生活的游子，一想起家乡美味，总会真情流露、百感交集。全新资讯节目《幸福乡味》，主持人将寻访在世界各地的新加坡人，烹调他们所熟悉的家乡美食，传递来自家的问候与温馨。.

programme.title: 拜托了夏天
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 此剧讲述即使家庭成员之间有时会很讨厌大家，但最终会因为大家是一家人而重归于好的快乐、温馨家庭故事。.

programme.title: 垂花琴木
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/泰) 文爷乘大伟在医院照隆昌时到钟欣的安全屋将琴木强行绑走，所幸之后她成功逃走. 大伟得知后，怒斥钟欣勾结外人把琴木带走.

programme.title: 台风的新娘
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 姜海用殷瑞妍开发的面膜谎称自己独立完成了面膜改版。然而在尹清风和台风的追问下才发现，原来姜海擅自挪用了别人的产品。.

programme.title: 台风的新娘
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 清风无意间发现了瑞妍的钥匙圈，并怀疑她就是姜风。另一边，遇见了神似允熙的女子后，白山开始怀疑允熙或许还活着，便打算着手调查此事。.

programme.title: 大胃王来了 - 东西军 （第五季）
programme.desc: 《大胃王来了!东西军》不只带你挖掘美食 更带你深入体验台湾各地风俗民情！.

programme.title: 代理公司
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 讲述高雅仁作为首位女性理事，并最终坐上最高位置的履历之路。以广告代理公司为背景，讲述为了站在顶峰，职场如战场的人们的日常与业界的幕后故事。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst QuadDrive
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) The story centers on Bel Daizora, the leader of the Bey graveyard "Phantom's Gate". Bel, who holds Destruction Belfyre, declares war on Bladers across the world. With Ranzo Kiyama and Bashara Suiro, their journey unfolds as Bel advances to becoming the Dark Prince.

programme.title: Aroma Puncak Borneo S1
programme.desc: The journey of a nomad to the peaks of the highlands in Borneo. Exploring gastronomy and cuisine while getting to know the customs and cultures of various ethnic groups on the Land of the Hornbills.

programme.title: Dan Mimpi Pun Berguguran
programme.desc: Mazi gives birth to a son, Idris, but with some complications with the baby. Saiful seeks out partners and investors to start his business.

programme.title: I Love You, Stupid
programme.desc: Azalea suspects that Iris and Lara are behind Izhar's disappearance. Iris feels left out when no one informs her of Fatimah's engagement.

programme.title: Makan INC
programme.desc: Sofia becomes more inspired to defeat Vicky and emerge as champion for the NHA competition. Helmi is forced to openly admit to his past crimes, affecting his relationship with Hayati and Haikal. Ashraf's legal case raises doubts in Daud whether Rizal has been the one who deserves to manage Makan Inc all this time.

programme.title: Krisalis
programme.desc: Sara hosts the relaunch of her business, Krisalis, but things take a humiliating turn when news about Husin's business breaks. Imran's pursue for Masters hits a setback while Auni's reputation is in jeopardy as her followers start turning against her.

programme.title: Ada Dua Cinta
programme.desc: Tells the story of two beautiful girls who have very different lives, named Mecca and Medina. Where Mecca was raised by Rohim and Aisyah, a husband and wife whose life was full of hardship. But in this family, Mecca's life never lacked love from her father and mother. Meanwhile, Medina lives in wealth, whatever he asks for, Bram his father, will always give him. However, unfortunately Medina's life was not as beautiful as other people imagined.

programme.title: King of Culinary S2
programme.desc: Kicking Raja Kulinari arena tonight are two culinary enthusiasts with varying level of culinary experience - Haziq and Khasyatillah. Watch as they try to win the hearts of the guest judge, Seriwahyuni Jaes and Regional Chef, Chef Zam with their mouth-watering dishes. Are they going to face-off with the mentor chef of their choice?

programme.title: Boleh Saya Bantu
programme.desc: Nasar is taught not to ask too many questions on the purposes of a guest staying in the hotel. Nasar and Sudin bring a religious teacher to intervene when a young couple check in.

programme.title: Cinta Tiada Ganti
programme.desc: Riz and Ara are left stranded on a deserted island when they accidentally get knocked off the boat returning to mainland.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst QuadDrive
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) The story centers on Bel Daizora, the leader of the Bey graveyard "Phantom's Gate". Bel, who holds Destruction Belfyre, declares war on Bladers across the world. With Ranzo Kiyama and Bashara Suiro, their journey unfolds as Bel advances to becoming the Dark Prince.

programme.title: Kualinari
programme.desc: What will happen when the blind leads the blind? That is what happens when dance mates, Sanisah and Yasmine attempt the cooking challenge by Chef Aina. Let's watch how this pair attacks the kitchen.

programme.title: Dan Mimpi Pun Berguguran
programme.desc: Saiful and Icha settle in slowly being married, trying to adapt and be comfortable with the situation. Mazi struggles with being a new mother.

programme.title: The Causeway
programme.desc: The bridge that connects 100 years of lives, hopes and ambition. These are five special stories of families, friends, lovers and the selfless. Everyday heroes whose lives are shaped by the Causeway.

programme.title: Luruhnya Bunga Cinta 2
programme.desc: As she recovers from the miscarriage, Aleen accuses Nuh of being the baby's father. Awal goes to Tan Sri Izzam to confirm his suspicion about his father's affair with Sarah. Meanwhile, Arra reconnects with Noriah and Anwar.

programme.title: Wanita Milik Kaiden
programme.desc: Things get awkward at the dinner table when Erman tells Haila and Kaiden that he knows they know each other. Haila sinks deeper into debt, while Erman shows no signs of stopping as he continues to accumulate more.

programme.title: Udayam 2
programme.desc: In the season premiere of Udayam 2, we meet a strong willed single mother who gives the best she can offer to her kids. She gets a makeover for her room to suit her children's preference.

programme.title: Ivan Yaaro
programme.desc: Establish Charan's interest in digital technology and AI. Father wants him to study law and is happy when he is offered a place in London law school. But Charan is going for an interview for a contract position at Zon reality, a leading digital company and is offered a position much to the displeasure of the father and brother Arun a top scorer in a JC who thinks that his brother is wasting time and mocks at him.

programme.title: Indian Beat S16
programme.desc: A bilingual magazine show that serves as a platform by featuring activities and events organized by the various Tamil and Indian ethnic organizations around Singapore.

programme.title: Siri…Siri Siri Siri S3
programme.desc: Compilation of comedy clips to tickle your laughing bone.

programme.title: Anjaraipetti S9
programme.desc: Anjaraipetti takes cookery onto a new level, transforming the home cooks into passionate chefs. The show helps viewers hone their culinary skills and brings new flavours to their kitchens.

programme.title: Anbai Thedi
programme.desc: Ramu is unemployed and lives with his sister. As he learns that his sister cannot bear a child, Ramu decides to give his first child to her.

programme.title: Kadalora Payanam
programme.desc: Chasing deep sea flavours across the Bay of Bengal and the Arabian sea while encapsulating the everyday lives of fishermen who live around the coasts and uncover the great Ocean tales as we savour the sea flavours.

programme.title: Neengal Kettavai (1984)
programme.desc: Two brothers, separated in childhood, grow up on opposite paths and unknowingly seek revenge for the same injustice that tore their family apart.

programme.title: Mellisai Hits S3
programme.desc: Collection of hit melody songs from 1990s - 2000s.

programme.title: Damu's Kitchen
programme.desc: Time to deep dive into some old, lesser known recipes that have been lost in time. Learn it from Chef Damu as he unveils the treasure trove of heritage recipes in this season of Damu's Kitchen.

programme.desc: Time to deep dive into some old, lesser known recipes that have been lost in time. Learn it from Chef Damu as he unveils the treasure trove of heritage recipes in this season of Damu's Kitchen.

programme.title: Asura Vettai
programme.desc: A forensic photographer begins seeing the dead through his camera lenses that leads him to solve an enigmatic series of murders which eventually holds the missing puzzle piece to find his recently missing wife.

programme.title: Dhuruvangal
programme.desc: Set in a fictional law firm, Dhuruvangal - Truth Prevails, is an intense legal drama where battles are fought both in and out of the courtroom. programme.title: Slumfood Millionaire: Provinces
programme.desc: In Pasil Cebu, the slum that never sleeps, these food vendors are cooking up filling meals for cheap, turning offal and offcuts into belly-warming dips and soups, and grilling up seafood for free.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: I Am a Hawker: Bib Gourmand Edition follows Singapore's most celebrated hawkers—those who've earned and fight to keep their Michelin Bib Gourmand. Each episode spotlights one hawker's journey through tradition, innovation, and the relentless pressure of holding that title, revealing the personal stakes, sacrifices, and resilience behind every award-winning dish.

programme.desc: Spancer takes a road trip on East Coast Road and learns how this road has transformed the ancient port city of Mahabalipuram into a surfer's paradise.

programme.title: Wombless
programme.desc: For over a decade, activists and government officials have been fighting back against the practice of unnecessary hysterectomies in India.
